alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County; South Central Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 28 at 2:49AM PST until December 29 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Siskiyou County and South Central Siskiyou County. * WHEN...From 7 PM Thursday to 7 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Siskiyou County; South Central Siskiyou County
